snippet: To hear Serena Williams and her coach tell it, the process of getting her ready to win Wimbledon for a record-tying 22nd Grand Slam title began with a series of chats over the phone not long after her loss in the French Open final....
lead_paragraph: To hear Serena Williams and her coach tell it, the process of getting her ready to win Wimbledon for a record-tying 22nd Grand Slam title began with a series of chats over the phone not long after her loss in the French Open final.

headline.print_headline: 'Serena I Know Was Back': Williams Gets to 22 at Wimbledon
headline.main: 'Serena I Know Was Back': Williams Gets to 22 at Wimbledon
